action.args: @karkat_idle KARKAT: LIKE I SAID, MAKE YOURSELF AT HOME. @karkat_talk KARKAT: FEEL FREE TO HANG OUT WITH MY LUSUS THERE. THOUGH I SHOULD WARN YOU, HE'S NEVER MET ANOTHER KID HE DIDN'T MAKE AT LEAST SOME VAGUE ATTEMPT TO EAT.
